question:
Which among the following statements about the Keibul Lamjao National Park are correct?
1. The park was initially declared as a Sanctuary in 1966, to preserve the natural refuge of the endangered Brow--antlered Deer Sangai (Rucervus eldi eldi)
2. The Keibul Lamjao, the only floating national park in the world and located near Moirang in the Bishnupur district of the state of Manipur
3. It was established as a National Park in the year of 1977
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The park was initially considered under the category of a sanctuary in 1966, to preserve the natural refuge of the endangered Brow -antlered Deer Sangai. It is the only floating National Park in the world which is situated in Manipur. It was declared a National Park in 1977.
